8 /* ros */
9 #include <ros/ros.h>
10 #include <ros/console.h>
11 
12 /* image */
13 #include <image_transport/image_transport.h>
14 #include <image_transport/camera_subscriber.h>
15 
16 /* opencv */
17 #include <opencv2/opencv.hpp>
18 #include <opencv2/imgproc.hpp>
19 #include "opencv2/highgui.hpp"
20 #include <opencv2/core/types.hpp>
21 #include <cv_bridge/cv_bridge.h>
22 
23 /* messages */
24 #include <sensor_msgs/Image.h>
25 
26 const int max_value_H = 360 / 2;
27 const int max_value = 255;
28 const std::string window_capture_name = "Video Capture";
29 const std::string window_detection_name = "Object Detection";
30 int low_H = 0, low_S = 0, low_V = 0, dilate_amnt = 0, erode_amnt = 0;
31 int high_H = max_value_H, high_S = max_value, high_V = max_value;
32 
33 static void on_low_H_thresh_trackbar(int, void*) {
34  low_H = std::min(high_H - 1, low_H);
35  cv::setTrackbarPos("Low H", window_detection_name, low_H);
36 }
37 
38 static void on_high_H_thresh_trackbar(int, void*) {
39  high_H = std::max(high_H, low_H + 1);
40  cv::setTrackbarPos("High H", window_detection_name, high_H);
41 }
42 
43 static void on_low_S_thresh_trackbar(int, void*) {
44  low_S = std::min(high_S - 1, low_S);
45  cv::setTrackbarPos("Low S", window_detection_name, low_S);
46 }
47 
48 static void on_high_S_thresh_trackbar(int, void*) {
49  high_S = std::max(high_S, low_S + 1);
50  cv::setTrackbarPos("High S", window_detection_name, high_S);
51 }
52 
53 static void on_low_V_thresh_trackbar(int, void*) {
54  low_V = std::min(high_V - 1, low_V);
55  cv::setTrackbarPos("Low V", window_detection_name, low_V);
56 }
57 
58 static void on_high_V_thresh_trackbar(int, void*) {
59  high_V = std::max(high_V, low_V + 1);
60  cv::setTrackbarPos("High V", window_detection_name, high_V);
61 }
62 
63 static void on_erode_thresh_trackbar(int, void*) {
64  erode_amnt = 0;
65  cv::setTrackbarPos("Erode", window_detection_name, erode_amnt);
66 }
67 
68 static void on_dilate_thresh_trackbar(int, void*) {
69  dilate_amnt = 0;
70  cv::setTrackbarPos("Dilate", window_detection_name, dilate_amnt);
71 }
72 
73 void imageCallback(const sensor_msgs::ImageConstPtr& msg) {
74  try {
75  /* Convert the ROS message into a cv_ptr & dereferencing the pointer to an OpenCV Mat */
76  cv_bridge::CvImagePtr cv_ptr = cv_bridge::toCvCopy(msg, "bgr8");
77  cv::Mat current_frame = cv_ptr->image;
78  cv::Mat frame_HSV, frame_threshold;
79  // Convert from BGR to HSV colorspace
80  cv::cvtColor(current_frame, frame_HSV, cv::COLOR_BGR2HSV);
81  // Detect the object based on HSV Range Values
82  cv::inRange(frame_HSV, cv::Scalar(low_H, low_S, low_V), cv::Scalar(high_H, high_S, high_V),
83  frame_threshold);
84  cv::erode(frame_threshold, frame_threshold, cv::Mat(), cv::Point(-1, -1), erode_amnt, 1, 1);
85  cv::dilate(frame_threshold, frame_threshold, cv::Mat(), cv::Point(-1, -1), dilate_amnt, 1,
86  1);
87 
88  // Show the frames
89  cv::imshow(window_detection_name, frame_threshold);
90  cv::waitKey(30);
91  } catch (cv_bridge::Exception& e) {
92  ROS_ERROR("Could not convert from '%s' to 'bgr8'.", msg->encoding.c_str());
93  }
94 }
95 
96 int main(int argc, char* argv[]) {
97  ros::init(argc, argv, "image_listener");
98  ros::NodeHandle nh;
99  cv::namedWindow(window_detection_name);
100 
101  // Trackbars to set thresholds for HSV values
102  cv::createTrackbar("Low H", window_detection_name, &low_H, max_value_H,
103  on_low_H_thresh_trackbar);
104  cv::createTrackbar("High H", window_detection_name, &high_H, max_value_H,
105  on_high_H_thresh_trackbar);
106  cv::createTrackbar("Low S", window_detection_name, &low_S, max_value, on_low_S_thresh_trackbar);
107  cv::createTrackbar("High S", window_detection_name, &high_S, max_value,
108  on_high_S_thresh_trackbar);
109  cv::createTrackbar("Low V", window_detection_name, &low_V, max_value, on_low_V_thresh_trackbar);
110  cv::createTrackbar("High V", window_detection_name, &high_V, max_value,
111  on_high_V_thresh_trackbar);
112  cv::createTrackbar("Erode", window_detection_name, &erode_amnt, 25, on_high_V_thresh_trackbar);
113  cv::createTrackbar("Dilate", window_detection_name, &dilate_amnt, 25,
114  on_high_V_thresh_trackbar);
115 
116  cv::Mat current_frame, frame_HSV, frame_threshold;
117  image_transport::ImageTransport it(nh);
118  image_transport::Subscriber sub = it.subscribe("image_rect_color", 10, imageCallback);
119 
120  ros::spin();
121  cv::destroyWindow(window_detection_name);
122 
123  return 0;
124 }
